statements: SELECT * FROM ecosystem_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_name, ecosystem_type, habitat FROM ecosystem_data WHERE biodiversity_index > 50;
SELECT id, species_name, ecosystem_type, latitude, longitude FROM ecosystem_data WHERE temperature < 25;
SELECT species_name, habitat, biodiversity_index FROM ecosystem_data WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_data WHERE precipitation BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM ecosystem_data WHERE ecosystem_type = 'Forest' AND biodiversity_index > 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat, biodiversity_index FROM ecosystem_data WHERE precipitation > 100 AND (ecosystem_type = 'Lake' OR ecosystem_type = 'River') ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT ecosystem_type FROM ecosystem_data;
SELECT ecosystem_type, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM ecosystem_data GROUP BY ecosystem_type;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_data WHERE habitat='Forest';
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM ecosystem_data WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_predictions WHERE prediction_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT species_id, predicted_population FROM biodiversity_predictions ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT id, species_name, humidity FROM ecosystem_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_data WHERE habitat = 'Forest' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, temperature FROM ecosystem_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT species_name, temperature, humidity FROM ecosystem_data WHERE habitat IN ('Forest', 'Grassland') ORDER BY species_name ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM ecosystem_data GROUP BY species_name, habitat HAVING avg_temperature > 20;

SELECT biodiversity_predictions.species_id, ecosystem_data.species_name, biodiversity_predictions.predicted_population FROM ecosystem_data JOIN biodiversity_predictions ON ecosystem_data.id = biodiversity_predictions.species_id WHERE prediction_date = '2023-10-15';
SELECT * FROM Ecosystem_data;
SELECT ecosystem_name, biodiversity_index FROM Ecosystem_data ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_population FROM Species_data WHERE species_population > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Machine_learning WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8 ORDER BY ml_algorithm;
SELECT ml_algorithm, accuracy_score FROM Machine_learning JOIN Species_data ON Machine_learning.species_id = Species_data.species_id WHERE Species_data.ecosystem_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Machine_learning ORDER BY ml_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species_name, species_population FROM Species_data WHERE species_population > 10000 ORDER BY species_population DESC;

SELECT ml_algorithm, accuracy_score, species_name FROM Machine_learning INNER JOIN Species_data ON Machine_learning.species_id = Species_data.species_id WHERE accuracy_score > 0.9 ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC;

SELECT ecosystem_name, AVG(biodiversity_index) AS avg_biodiversity FROM Ecosystem_data JOIN Species_data ON Ecosystem_data.ecosystem_id = Species_data.ecosystem_id GROUP BY ecosystem_name HAVING avg_biodiversity > 0.5;

SELECT ecosystem_name, species_name, ml_algorithm FROM Ecosystem_data JOIN Species_data ON Ecosystem_data.ecosystem_id = Species_data.ecosystem_id JOIN Machine_learning ON Species_data.species_id = Machine_learning.species_id ORDER BY ecosystem_name, species_name, ml_algorithm DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems;
SELECT id, name, region FROM ecosystems;
SELECT family, name FROM species WHERE type = 'Mammal';
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data WHERE abundance > 100 ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE region = 'Asia' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, type, family FROM species WHERE type = 'Mammal' ORDER BY family ASC;

SELECT ecosystems.name, species.name, biodiversity_data.abundance FROM ecosystems JOIN biodiversity_data ON ecosystems.id = biodiversity_data.ecosystem_id JOIN species ON species.id = biodiversity_data.species_id WHERE abundance > 100 ORDER BY ecosystems.name, species.name;

SELECT ecosystems.name, COUNT(*) AS species_count FROM ecosystems JOIN biodiversity_data ON ecosystems.id = biodiversity_data.ecosystem_id GROUP BY ecosystems.name HAVING species_count > 2 ORDER BY species_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(accuracy) AS max_accuracy, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE trained_on > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EcosystemData;
SELECT ecosystem_name, biodiversity_index FROM EcosystemData WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM SpeciesData WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT habitat_type, temperature, rainfall FROM HabitatData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT model_name, accuracy, training_data_size FROM PredictionModel WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY training_data_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM EcosystemData;
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_type, temperature, rainfall FROM HabitatData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM SpeciesData ORDER BY population_size DESC;

SELECT EcosystemData.ecosystem_name, PredictionModel.model_name, BiodiversityPatterns.biodiversity_score FROM EcosystemData JOIN BiodiversityPatterns ON EcosystemData.ecosystem_id = BiodiversityPatterns.ecosystem_id JOIN PredictionModel ON BiodiversityPatterns.model_id = PredictionModel.model_id;
SELECT * FROM HabitatData WHERE habitat_type='Forest' AND temperature < 30 AND rainfall > 100;
